# Scaling Filters

**API Collection**

These constants specify the scaling filters used by [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/magnificationFilter] and [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/minificationFilter].

## Constants

- **linear**: Linear interpolation filter.
- **nearest**: Nearest neighbor interpolation filter.
- **trilinear**: Trilinear minification filter. Enables mipmap generation. Some renderers may ignore this, or impose additional restrictions, such as source images requiring power-of-two dimensions.

## Constants

- **CAAutoresizingMask**: These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/autoresizingMask] property.
- **Action Identifiers**: These constants are the predefined action identifiers used by [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/action(forKey:)], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/add(_:forKey:)], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/defaultAction(forKey:)], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/removeAnimation(forKey:)], Layer Filters, and the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAAction] protocol method [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAAction/run(forKey:object:arguments:)].
- **CAEdgeAntialiasingMask**: This mask is used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/edgeAntialiasingMask] property.
- **Identity Transform**: Defines the identity transform matrix used by Core Animation.
- **CATransform3D**: The standard transform matrix used throughout Core Animation.
- **CALayer.DynamicRange**
